item.title: Switching client background?
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[quote=“Flubbypb, post:1, topic:509296”]I’ve been trying to figure this out for hours by myself and I have looked around on the forum - haven’t found anything.

I’m using TrisidiaX V3’s client. There wasn’t a Sprites folder included, so I have no idea where the image came from.
Looking through sprites.java, I’ve tried to play around with
“Image Image Toolkit.Getdefaulttoolkit().createimage(Location+Login/Background.png”);

Haven’t had any luck there either. Any idea what the problem is? :[/quote]

C:/TheCacheName/Sprites/Login/Background.png

Read full topic

item.title: Switching client background?
item.dc:creator: @Flubbypb Flubbypb
item.description:
@Flubbypb wrote:

I’ve been trying to figure this out for hours by myself and I have looked around on the forum - haven’t found anything.

I’m using TrisidiaX V3’s client. There wasn’t a Sprites folder included, so I have no idea where the image came from.
Looking through sprites.java, I’ve tried to play around with
“Image Image Toolkit.Getdefaulttoolkit().createimage(Location+Login/Background.png”);

Haven’t had any luck there either. Any idea what the problem is? :\

Read full topic
